properties.name: Antarctica
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI have always wanted to go to Antarctica because of the freezing climate and the amazing animals. I think the main thing I would do if I went, would be taking lots and lots of pictures of the ice and different creatures that live there.

properties.name: Cuba
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellIf you leave out the communist side of Cuba, it is a really nice country. Though it is very hard to get there, after your passport and everything, there are many amazing beaches and resorts. The weather is also nice and calm.

properties.name: Dublin
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI have always wanted to visit Ireland because I\'m Irish and its a nice place. I was thinking of where I would go and I thought Dublin would be a great place to visit because of the old government buildings that have awsome designs and because of the annually cool weather.

properties.name: Ethiopia
properties.description: Posted by Maxandwell If I were to go into the missions field, this is where I would go. In fact, this is where my youth pastor is right now, serving for two years. I would choose this area because this is one of the poorest areas in Africa and the World. It also has amazing weather and amazing mountains.

properties.name: Honolulu, Hawaii
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellThe reason I put Honolulu, Hawaii as a place on my map is because I would love to visit there. I have heard so many great things about it and have seen many great pictures. The geographical and weather reasons I would like to go to Honolulu are, it\'s mountainous and the average daily temperature is about 73 degrees

properties.name: L.A.
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI would love to visit Los Angeles mainly because of its reputation. I\'ve heard that the water\'s warm and the sand is soft. I would also like to visit L.A. because of its amazing downtown area. The last reason I would like to visit here is because it is very dry and in fact, this year it is supposed to be the driest its been for a long time.

properties.name: NYC
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellSure New York City can get hot during the summer time, but I love visiting in February, March, or April because of the cool weather a nice skies. I also love the enviroment there, with all of the different people around you. Last but not least, I love the different places you can visit in the city, like the Empire State building and the different museums.

properties.name: Russia
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI would love to visit Russia because of the unique architecture and its historical buildings and sights. I would also like to visit because it gets very cold there. The picture on the top right is a new building that started building in September of \'07 and should be done within the next year.

properties.name: Sydney, Australia
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI would love to visit Sydney because of the nice weather and warm water.

properties.name: West Palm
properties.description: Posted by MaxandwellI love going to West Palm Beach in Florida because of the clear water and unique beaches. The reason I say that there unique is because of their penninsula shape. I also think that West Palm Beach is much more welcoming then other Florida beaches because it\'s cleaner and better smelling.
